original_text: After the Philistines had captured the ark of God, they took it from Ebenezer to Ashdod.
korean_text: 블레셋 사람들이 하나님의 궤를 빼앗아 가지고 에벤에셀에서부터 아스돗에 이르니라

sentences.original_text: After the Philistines had captured the ark of God
sentences.korean_translation: 블레셋 사람들이 하나님의 법궤를 사로잡은 후에

sentences.original_text: they took it from Ebenezer to Ashdod
